name: tawrestaurant
description: MEAN app for the order management of an hypothetical restaurant

scripts.install: cd backend/ && npm install && cd - && cd angular-app/TAWRESTaurant/ && npm install && cd - && cd cordova-app/TAWRESTaurantMobile/ && npm install && cd - && cd electron-app/TAWRESTaurantDesktop/ && npm install && cd -
scripts.mongo: cd backend/ && npm run mongo && cd -
scripts.build-web: cd angular-app/TAWRESTaurant/ && ng build -c production && cd - && cd backend/ && npm run build && cd -
scripts.populate: cd backend/ && npm run populate && cd -
scripts.start-web: cd backend/ && npm run start && cd -
scripts.build-android: cd angular-app/TAWRESTaurant/ && ng build -c cordova && cd - && cd cordova-app/TAWRESTaurantMobile/ && npm run clean-index && npm run build-android && cd -
scripts.start-android: cd cordova-app/TAWRESTaurantMobile/ && npm run start-android && cd -
scripts.build-linux: cd angular-app/TAWRESTaurant/ && ng build -c electron && cd - && cd electron-app/TAWRESTaurantDesktop/ && npm run clean-index && npm run build-linux && cd -
scripts.start-linux: cd electron-app/TAWRESTaurantDesktop/ && npm run start-linux && cd -

author: Battistich, Alvise; Casarin, Samuele
